import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { CartItem, CartEmpty } from '../components'; import { selectCart } from '../redux/cart/selectors'; import { clearItems } from '../redux/cart/slice'; const Cart: React.FC = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { totalPrice, items } = useSelector(selectCart); const totalCount = items.reduce((sum: number, item: any) => sum + item.count, 0); const onClickClear = () => { if (window.confirm('Очистити кошик?')) { dispatch(clearItems()); } }; if (!totalPrice) { return ; } return (
